Properties.string: Click to shoot pucks. Right click to check someone!

Properties.ProtectedString:
---------------------- --| Tool Variables |-- ---------------------- local Tool = script.Parent Tool.Enabled = true local IsCheckValue = Tool:WaitForChild('IsCheck') local Mouse = nil
---------------------- --| Constants |-- ---------------------- local SWING_TIME = 0.85 local CHECK_TIME = 0.5 local CHECK_SPEED = 50
---------------------- --| Animations |-- ---------------------- local IdleAnim = Tool:WaitForChild('Idle') local IdleTrack = nil local SwingAnim = Tool:WaitForChild('Swing') local SwingTrack = nil local CheckAnim = Tool:WaitForChild('Check') local CheckTrack = nil
---------------------- --|Helper Functions|-- ---------------------- local function doCheck(torso) local bodyVelocity = Instance.new('BodyVelocity') bodyVelocity.Name = 'CheckVelocity' bodyVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(40000, 0, 40000) --Fix implemented by Luckymaxer bodyVelocity.velocity = torso.CFrame.lookVector * CHECK_SPEED bodyVelocity.Parent = torso end
---------------------- --| Events |-- ---------------------- local function onMouse1Down() if not Tool.Enabled then return end
Tool.Enabled = not Tool.Enabled
local character = Tool.Parent local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 then SwingTrack = humanoid:LoadAnimation(SwingAnim) if SwingTrack then SwingTrack:Play() end wait(SWING_TIME) if SwingTrack then SwingTrack:Stop() end end
Tool.Enabled = not Tool.Enabled end
local function onMouse2Up() if not Tool.Enabled then return end
Tool.Enabled = not Tool.Enabled IsCheckValue.Value = true
local character = Tool.Parent local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') local torso = character:FindFirstChild('Torso') if humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 and torso then CheckTrack = humanoid:LoadAnimation(CheckAnim) doCheck(torso) if CheckTrack then CheckTrack:Play() end wait(CHECK_TIME) if CheckTrack then CheckTrack:Stop() end if torso then local bodyVelocity = torso:FindFirstChild('CheckVelocity') if bodyVelocity then bodyVelocity:Destroy() bodyVelocity.Parent = nil end end end
IsCheckValue.Value = false Tool.Enabled = not Tool.Enabled end
local function onEquipped(mouse) if Tool.Parent then local character = Tool.Parent local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if humanoid then IdleTrack = humanoid:LoadAnimation(IdleAnim) if IdleTrack then wait(0.25) IdleTrack:Play() end end end
if mouse then Mouse = mouse Mouse.Button1Down:connect(onMouse1Down) Mouse.Button2Up:connect(onMouse2Up) end end
local function onUnequipped() if IdleTrack then IdleTrack:Stop() end if SwingTrack then SwingTrack:Stop() end if CheckTrack then CheckTrack:Stop() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

---------------------- --| Tool Variables |-- ---------------------- local Tool = script.Parent local Handle = Tool:WaitForChild('Handle') local Ragdoller = script:WaitForChild('Ragdoller') local IsCheckValue = Tool:WaitForChild('IsCheck') local CanSwing = true local HitList = {}
---------------------- --| Services |-- ---------------------- local DebrisService = game:GetService('Debris')
---------------------- --| Constants |-- ---------------------- local PUCK_DAMAGE = 50 local CHECK_DAMAGE = 50 local SWING_TIME = 0.85 local PUCK_SPEED = 75 local PUCK_THETA = math.rad(5)
---------------------- --| Animations |-- ---------------------- local IdleAnim = Tool:WaitForChild('Idle') local IdleTrack = nil local SwingAnim = Tool:WaitForChild('Swing') local SwingTrack = nil
---------------------- --|Helper Functions|-- ---------------------- local function getVectorRight(cf) local _,_,_,x,_,_,y,_,_,z = cf:components() return Vector3.new(x, y, z) end
local function rodriguesRotation(v, theta, k) return v * math.cos(theta) + (k:Cross(v) * math.sin(theta)) + (k * (k:Dot(v)) * (1 - math.cos(theta))) end
local function createPuck(cframe) local newPuck = Instance.new('Part') newPuck.BrickColor = BrickColor.new('Really black') newPuck.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom newPuck.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.3, 1) newPuck.Anchored = true newPuck.CanCollide = false
local mesh = Instance.new('CylinderMesh') mesh.Parent = newPuck newPuck.CFrame = cframe * CFrame.new(3.2, -2.85, -1)
newPuck.Touched:connect(function(other) if other.Parent then local hitCharacter = other.Parent local hitHumanoid = hitCharacter:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') local thisCharacter = Tool.Parent if thisCharacter == hitCharacter then return end if hitHumanoid and hitHumanoid.Health > 0 then local newRagdoller = Ragdoller:Clone() newRagdoller.Parent = hitCharacter newRagdoller.Disabled = false hitHumanoid:TakeDamage(PUCK_DAMAGE) newPuck:Destroy() end end end)
newPuck.Parent = Workspace DebrisService:AddItem(newPuck, 2)
Delay(0.5, function() newPuck.Anchored = false newPuck.CanCollide = true
local bodyVelocity = Instance.new('BodyVelocity') local velocity = rodriguesRotation(newPuck.CFrame.lookVector, PUCK_THETA, getVectorRight(newPuck.CFrame)) bodyVelocity.velocity = velocity * PUCK_SPEED bodyVelocity.Parent = newPuck end) end
---------------------- --| Events |-- ---------------------- local function onHandleTouch(other) if IsCheckValue.Value then if other.Parent then local hitCharacter = other.Parent local hitHumanoid = hitCharacter:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') local thisCharacter = Tool.Parent if thisCharacter == hitCharacter then return end for key,val in pairs(HitList) do if key == hitCharacter then return end end if hitHumanoid and hitHumanoid.Health > 0 then HitList[hitCharacter] = true Delay(0.5, function() if HitList[hitCharacter] then HitList[hitCharacter] = nil end end) local newRagdoller = Ragdoller:Clone() newRagdoller.Parent = hitCharacter newRagdoller.Disabled = false hitHumanoid:TakeDamage(CHECK_DAMAGE) end end end end
local function onActivated() if not CanSwing or IsCheckValue.Value then return end
CanSwing = not CanSwing
local character = Tool.Parent local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') local torso = character:FindFirstChild('Torso') if humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 and torso then createPuck(torso.CFrame) wait(SWING_TIME) end
CanSwing = not CanSwing end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Handle.Touched:connect(onHandleTouch)

local Debris = Game:GetService('Debris') local Character = script.Parent local Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') local BAV = script:WaitForChild('BAV') local Torso = Character:FindFirstChild('Torso')
if Humanoid then Humanoid.PlatformStand = true if Torso then BAV.angularvelocity = Vector3.new(math.random(1,5), (12 + math.random(0,8)), math.random(1,5)) BAV.Parent = Torso end wait(1) if BAV then BAV:Destroy() end wait(2) Humanoid.PlatformStand = false end
wait(3) script:Destroy()
